title: Prince George's County Schools launches pilot with Colin Kaepernick's AI program Lumi
description: Prince George’s County Public Schools (PGCPS) has launched a pilot program that will allow kids to use an artificial intelligence-powered graphic design tool.
content:
Prince George’s County Public Schools (PGCPS) has launched a pilot program that will allow kids to use an artificial intelligence-powered graphic design tool, Lumi Story.

title: Timbaland’s Latest Protégée Is an A.I. Pop Singer
description: The producer dreamed up TaTa Taktumi and brought her to life with help from the software Suno. She’s arriving at a fraught moment for artificial intelligence in music.
content: Timbaland has been producing shape-shifting hip-hop, R&B and pop music since the mid-1990s. He’s won four Grammys, created iconic hits with Jay-Z and Justin Timberlake and has been a mentor to artists including Aaliyah and Missy Elliott. His latest p... [1637 chars]

title: European Union probes Google for possible 'anticompetitive' use of copyrighted material for AI-generated summaries
description: Google faces a fresh antitrust investigation in Brussels over whether it ripped off copyrighted material to train its artificial intelligence models without properly compensating publishers, the European Commission announced Tuesday.
content:
Google faces a fresh antitrust investigation in Brussels over whether it ripped off copyrighted material to train its artificial intelligence models without properly compensating publishers, the European Commission announced Tuesday.

title: LSU students present AI solutions for local industry
description: LSU students developed artificial intelligence solutions for Baton Rouge-area industries and presented them to sponsors Monday night as part of the College of Engineering’s AI Showcase.
content:
Overlooking Tiger Stadium and the Mississippi River, students in LSU’s artificial intelligence capstone course presented their business-focused AI solutions to industry partners in the Baton Rouge area.

title: Microsoft investing $17.5 billion in India for AI and cloud infrastructure
description: Microsoft on Tuesday announced its biggest-ever Asia investment, amounting to $17.5 billion, in India over the next four years to advance the country’s cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure. title: AI earns high marks in law school grading
description: Artificial intelligence is pretty good at taking law school exams, according to a growing body of research. Should it be used to grade them?
content:
Dec 9 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence is pretty good at taking law school exams, according to a growing body of research. Should it be used to grade them?

title: San Francisco 49ers: Stake sale to OpenAI chair values NFL team at $9bn
description: The San Francisco 49ers have been valued at more than $9bn after the chairman of artificial intelligence behemoth OpenAI agreed to acquire a stake in the NFL franchise.
content:
